page.title: 16A BUSY TUESDAY IN PEBMARSH
page.content: I get up,put on my shirt,tie, skirt and cardigan,have breakfast and brush my teeth with Minty Gel.I travel to school,in the Mini-bus,where my first job is{Handwriting.}Mr.Chamberlain calls me for recorders and I play "The Hunt".After my{Music}lesson I do some{ {Maths,}waiting for lunchtime.My favourite{lunch}is beefburgers. In the afternoon,we{sew}and{knit.}I am making a patterned recorder case.After {story}or{singing}it is hometime. Then I go to{Brownies}where we learn and make things.Before we go home we say our prayers. At the end of my busy Tuesday,I snuggle into my flowery duvet!
